transcript:
Hi, my name is Jacob Staton and this is
my session three assignment.
So for this assignment, instead of just
making like a basic savings calculator,
I have decided that I wanted it to be a
little more advanced and as per the
requirements for the assignment, I
wanted it to answer I wanted to actually
analyze instead of just giving like a
what answer. It actually analyzes what's
going on and tries to change it. So this
is an app I've developed using AI. It's
called Aura.
And over here it has some basic
financial info.
Gives us our net worth.
It increases over time with some value
numbers.
Down here we have a monthly spending
limit and it's divided into into three
categories at the moment. You've got
dining and leisure, groceries, and
transport.
Transport and groceries are fine because
we're under 100%.
However,
that may be because our dining and
leisure, as you can see by this little
notification down here, it says exceeded
by $140 cuz it's 112%.
So, the app will basically notify us
and it will give us this notificationsaying, "I've noticed a 12% increase in
your discretionary spending this month.
would you like to explore why this is
happening and how it impacts your
long-term goals? And so I respond yes.
And then it says based on your
transaction history.
The primary driver is dining out, which
is correct. It says you visited upscale
restaurants four times more than your
average, which will do it. And that
aligns with your recent promotion.
However, if you keep maintaining this
behavior, it will delay your home down
payment by approximately 8 months, which
is not good. And it asks, should we
adjust your budget or your timeline? And
it's not just letting you know, it's
giving you a choice between adjusting
your budget or your timeline. And that's
what I meant by
um what I meant by instead of just
giving you a heads up, it'll actually
analyze it and give you options based on
your current situation.
